statements: UPDATE countries SET capital='Brussels' WHERE name='Belgium';
UPDATE government_officials SET position='President' WHERE name='Joe Biden';
UPDATE government_officials SET country_id=2 WHERE name='Angela Merkel';

UPDATE government.employees SET name = 'John Doe' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE government.projects SET name = 'Project X' WHERE project_id = 1;
